This premium set of minis is the perfect introduction to Emma Lewisham’s range. Emma has selected products for the ultimate beauty regime, including: Skin Reset, Supernatural 72-Hour Hydration Crème, Supernatural Face Oil, Skin Reset Eye Crème, Illuminating Cleanser, Illuminating Exfoliant and Brighten Your Day Crème.

You can refill your minis using their full size product refills. In this set of mini Emma Lewisham essentials, Emma has selected key products for the ultimate beauty regime, resulting in a hydrated and radiantly healthy complexion. This beautiful range includes:

Skin Reset Concentrated Even Skin Tone Face Serum (7ml / 0.2 fl.oz)

Emma Lewisham’s award winning Skin Reset has become a cult favourite for evening skin tone, combating hyperpigmentation and restoring radiance. A scientifically proven formulation of naturally active, green-tech ingredients, it’s unparalleled brightening benefits have been proven to outperform the most recognised brightening products on the market.

*Independent biomedical laboratory test (2020)

Supernatural 72-Hour Hydration Face Crème Riche (9ml / 0.3 fl.oz)

Emma Lewisham’s Supernatural Crème uses 72 hour moisture lock technology to deeply hydrate the skin, instantly delivering a luminous glow alongside phenomenal age-defying results. A powerful combination of naturally active ingredients, this scientifically proven* formulation sets a new benchmark in skincare.

*Independent In-Vitro Scientific Testing into the effects on the production of type 1 collagen (2020)

Supernatural Vitamin A Renewal Face Oil (3ml / 0.1 fl.oz)

A lightweight, nutrient dense and youth restoring elixir – Emma Lewisham’s potent Supernatural Oil delivers complete skin nourishment. Rejuvenating skin, targeting fine lines and wrinkles, restoring plump, youthful skin and revealing a lifted, luminous complexion – this results-oriented formulation delivers age-defying results that you can see and feel.

Illuminating Cleanser (15ml / 0.5 fl.oz)

This luxurious cleanser deeply cleans skin, dissolving makeup, pollution and impurities, while fatty acids help restore skin’s natural moisture. This full spectrum skin-beautifying formulation is packed with antioxidants and nutrients to deliver unparalleled performance in cleansing and hydration.

Illuminating Exfoliant (9ml / 0.3 fl.oz)

Emma Lewisham’s advanced Illuminating Exfoliant polishes away impurities, resurfacing, brightening and giving deep 24 hour hydration to reveal an instantly smooth, supple and radiant complexion. Exfoliant favourites, AHA and BHA gently dissolve pore-clogging debris restoring a clear, healthy and luminous glow.

Illuminating Brighten Your Day Crème (9ml / 0.3 fl.oz)

Emma Lewisham’s Illuminating Brighten Your Day Crème delivers unparalleled brightening. Uniquely proven to boost collagen in vitro* production, provide 72 hour deep hydration and gently exfoliate skin, it reveals lifted, luminous and brilliantly bright skin – giving you your daily dose of glow.

*Independent scientific in-vitro testing 2020 into the production of Type I collagen production

Skin Reset Eye Crème (3ml / 0.1 fl.oz)

Introducing a mini preview of our newest product, packed with ceramides, lipopeptides and active delivery systems – the Skin Reset Eye Crème. Powerful antixoidant CoQ10, ribose, and master hydration powerhouse saccharide isomerate work to smooth fine lines, brighten and visibly hydrate the delicate eye contour area.
